agreeableness.explanation: Low → slow to forgive, likes blunt honesty.

neuroticism.explanation: High → bigger mood swings, jealousy spikes faster.

boldness.explanation: Comfortable taking risks or confronting rivals.

openness.explanation: Moderately curious about new ideas or experiences.

conscientiousness.explanation: So-so self-discipline; keeps promises… most of the time.

trust.explanation: How much {{char}} believes the MC’s words and intentions.

affection.explanation: Warm, fuzzy feelings; drives kind gestures and compliments.

respect.explanation: Professional esteem; gates cooperation on serious tasks.

resentment.explanation: Stored grudges.  Positive numbers mean active bitterness.

protective.explanation: Instinct to shield the MC from harm; sky-high = yandere vibes.

dependency.explanation: Emotional reliance; panic if left alone too long.

physical_intimacy.explanation: Comfort with hugs, casual touch, shared bed.

sexual_tension.explanation: Attraction × unmet desire; drops sharply after intimacy.

proximity_need.explanation: Desire to stay physically close; rises when apart.

body_lang_trust.explanation: Eye contact, relaxed posture; non-verbal comfort signals.

relationship_stage.explanation: Overall milestone: acquaintance → ally → partner → obsessed.

romance_available.explanation: Becomes true once affection > 70 AND trust > 60.

jealous_of_rival.explanation: Flips true if protectiveness spikes during rival praise.
